üíΩCommands#

Command Decorator#

GoldyBot.goldy.commands.decorator.command(name: str | None = None, description: str | None = None, required_roles: List[str] | None = None, slash_options: Dict[str, ChoicesStringOptionData | ChoicesIntegerCommandOptionData | MinMaxIntegerCommandOptionData | MinMaxStringOptionData | BooleanOptionData | UserOptionData | ChannelOptionData | RoleOptionData | MentionableOptionData | ChoicesNumberCommandOptionData | MinMaxNumberCommandOptionData | AutocompleteStringOptionData | AutocompleteIntegerOptionData | AutocompleteNumberOptionData | SubcommandOptionData | AttachmentOptionData] | None = None, slash_cmd_only: bool = False, normal_cmd_only: bool = False)[source]#

Add a command to Goldy Bot with this decorator.

‚≠ê Example:#

This is how you create a command in GoldyBot:

@GoldyBot.command()
async def hello(platter: GoldyBot.GoldenPlatter):
    await platter.send_message("üëãhello", reply=True)

Command#

class GoldyBot.goldy.commands.Command(goldy: Goldy, func, name: str = None, description: str = None, required_roles: List[str] = None, slash_options: Dict[str, ApplicationCommandOptionData] = None, allow_prefix_cmd: bool = True, allow_slash_cmd: bool = True, parent_cmd: Command = None)[source]#

Bases: object

Class that represents all commands in goldy bot.

allow_prefix_cmd#

If the creation of a prefix command is allowed.

allow_slash_cmd#

If the creation of a slash command is allowed.

async create_slash() → List[ChatInputCommandData | ContextMenuCommandData][source]#

Creates and registers a slash command in goldy bot. E.g.``/goldy``

description#

The command‚Äôs set description. None if there is no description set.

property extension: Extension | None#

Finds and returns the object of the command‚Äôs extension. Returns None if command is not in any extension.

property extension_name: str | None#

Returns extension‚Äôs code name.

func: Callable#

The command‚Äôs callback function.

property in_extension: bool#

Returns true if the command is in an extension.

async invoke(gold_platter: GoldenPlatter) → None[source]#

Runs/triggers this command. This method is mostly supposed to be used internally.

property is_child#

Returns if command is child or not. Basically is it a subcommand or not essentially.

async load() → bool[source]#

Loads and creates the command.

property loaded: bool#

Returns whether this command has been loaded.

name#

The command‚Äôs code name.

parent_cmd#

Command object of the parent command if this command is a subcommand.

async remove_slash() → None[source]#

Un-registers the slash command.

required_roles#

The code names for the roles needed to access this command.

slash_options#

Allows you to customize slash command arguments and make them beautiful ü•∞.

async unload() → None[source]#

Unloads and removes the command from cache.

GoldyBot.goldy.commands.commands_cache: List[Tuple[str, object]] = []#

This cache contains all the commands that have been registered and it‚Äôs memory location to the class.

Command Listener#

class GoldyBot.goldy.commands.listener.CommandListener(goldy: Goldy)[source]#

Bases: object

Class that handles the invoking of commands.

async on_prefix_cmd(message: ChannelMessageData | GuildMessageData) → None[source]#
async on_slash_cmd(interaction: InteractionData) → None[source]#
async start_listening() → None[source]#

Registers nextcore listeners and starts listening for commands.

Command Loader#

class GoldyBot.goldy.commands.loader.CommandLoader(goldy: Goldy)[source]#

Bases: object

Class that handles command loading.

async load() → None[source]#
async load(commands: List[Command]) → None

Loads all commands that have been initialized in goldy bot.
